title: The Capitol Disgrace
sub_head: Protesters interrupt the certification of the presidential election.
body:
Protesters occupying the Capitol Building in Washington have delayed the certification of Joe Biden as President-elect. Serene financial markets suggest investors see no significant threat to the republic, but many Americans are sure to be appalled by the disturbing images from Washington of thousands of people unwilling to accept the election results and attempting to interrupt the transfer of power.
The Journal reports:
